column1: Little Goat Diner////People on Yelp raved about the French toast so I was really looking forward to it
column2: but unfortunately it ended up being really disappointing. It wasn't bad
column3: but nothing was really special. It was just kind of burnt toast with an egg in the center
column4: covered in fried chicken and strawberries. The chicken especially was nothing special. I could probably get better fried chicken at a fast food place. Overall it was pretty disappointing and not worth the $16 price.
